front.title: Generic Header Compression Notation for ROHC

abstract.t: This draft describes the framework of the generic header compression notation (ROHC-GN). The goal of Robust Header Compression (ROHC) is to develop generic header compression schemes that perform well over links with high error rates and long roundtrip times. ROHC will develop multiple compression schemes, for example, ROHC-RTP, ROHC-TCP [ROHC-TCP], ROHC-SCTP [ROHC-SCTP], etc. Our proposed generic header compression notation will describe the header fields that are to be compressed, and the information to be transmitted in the compressed header. Using this notation and the corresponding encoding methods, we can have a toolbox to standardize future ROHC profiles.
